alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 9:28AM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to a quarter of an inch. Ice accumulations in excess of a quarter of an inch possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected Tuesday morning. Areas of slippery travel are possible this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice accumulations in excess of a quarter of an inch are possible, especially northwest of a line from Monticello to Warsaw to Hillsdale.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
